name: Happy_Helping_Hands
text:
Happy Helping Hands
"I've enlisted myself in the Happy Helping Hand program."
 ―Dick Tremayne
Happy Helping Hands was an adoption agency active in the Twin Peaks, Washington area.
Through this agency, Dick Tremayne took care of Nicky Needleman.
History
To be added
Personnel
